ai-patthana22.13:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.13:1.1_0: Not skilled in what isn’t skilled in what is skillful and what is good, what is the cause and what is the reason why.
ai-patthana22.13:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.13:2.1_0: Not You shouldn’t give rise to unshakable thoughts, without reason.
ai-patthana22.13:2.1_1: Not undeclared by the Buddha, he doesn’t give rise to undeclared teaching, without cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.13:2.1_2: Not knowing the Teaching, skilled in terms of causes and reasons,
ai-patthana22.13:2.1_3: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana22.13:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
